name: Satsuma Mojito
recipeIngredient: 4 sprigs mint, plus extra for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: In a large shaker, muddle 1 lime and 2 Satsumas with 2 sprigs mint. Add ½ cup rum, 2 tablespoons simple syrup and crushed ice. Shake. Strain into 2 small Collins glasses filled with crushed ice and top with club soda. Garnish each with a sprig of mint. Repeat.
